Summary: Pulsating lights in Glendale, AZ sky during storm
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Glendale
There were no other sightings in Glendale on or around June 30th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsObserved lights in sky that seem to come from on top of a cloud. At first Ithought it was lighting, it was during a storm but the lights repeated apattern. It lasted for about three hours. There seemed to be four lights thatwould all merge together than they would move away from each other in a circleand come back to the center and the same pattern repeated over and over. Thiswas caught on video.
